description:
This task is create an issue in android project.

Steps to be followed :
* Open github
* Choose an android project from your choice
* Create an issue 
* Sent an issue screenshot on gitter channel : https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos or https://gitter.im/sukhbeer with message issue created.

Resource for how to create an issue :
https://help.github.com/en/github/managing-your-work-on-github/creating-an-issue
name: Create Issue on Github
